HTMLBaseElement.summary: The HTMLBaseElement interface contains the base URI for a document. This object inherits all of the properties and methods as described in the interface.

HTMLBaseElementTarget.summary: The target property of the interface is a string that represents the default target tab to show the resulting output for hyperlinks and form elements.

remarks.para: It reflects the target attribute of the base element.

HTMLBaseElementTarget.value: A string representing the target. Its value can be:

HTMLBaseElementHref.summary: The href property of the interface contains a string that is the URL to use as the base for relative URLs.

remarks.para: It reflects the href attribute of the base element.

HTMLBaseElementHref.value: A string that contains a URL, or the empty string ("") if the corresponding <base> element does not include the href attribute.
